title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Randy Merilatt Promoted to Raima's CTO
The full text of the press release: Randy Merilatt Promoted to Raima's CTO/brSunday; October 24; 2010/br/brSeattle; WA (PRWEB) October 24; 2010 /brRaima Inc.; which offers state of the art embedded database and dataflow technologies; today announced that co founder Randy Merilatt has been promoted to Chief Technology Officer and will be responsible for all future product direction./br"As one of the founders of Raima; Randy has played a key role in the product development of the RDM products and I am excited to have him as Raima's CTO"; said Steinar Sande; Raima CEO. "Randy's technical expertise in the development of database software makes him one of the leading authorities on the subject. Additionally his in depth knowledge and understanding of the requirements of our clients who are developing embedded systems applications will be invaluable for the future direction of the Raima products. In his role as CTO Randy is responsible for managing the overall product strategy; develop and communicate Raima's technical vision and lead all aspects of Raima's R&D initiatives. As a member of the senior management team Randy brings additional strengths which will help Raima expand our market leadership in the embedded database market and realize even greater product innovation to meet changing customer requirements". /brMr. Merilatt has over 35 years of experience in software development. He; along with fellow Raima co founder; Wayne Warren; pioneered the embedded database market when they developed and introduced the first generation of the Raima database management product in 1984. Mr. Merilatt past contributions at Raima were focused around his primary role as Principal Systems Architect and included the direct responsibility for released technologies such as RDM Server's SQL component; hot online backup subsystem; multithreaded application link and dynamic DDL capabilities. A recent project to be released in the upcoming release of RDM Embedded is a brand new SQL component for use in real time and embedded computing applications. Prior to the founding of Raima; Mr. Merilatt was a member of an R&D team at the Boeing Company where he served on a variety of projects relating to software engineering technology including serving as the Program Manager for a NASA project to develop an integrated software testing and verification system for the Space Shuttle's system software. He also held the position of programmer and database designer for a real time; law enforcement information system at the Colorado Bureau of Investigation. Mr. Merilatt received a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics from the University of Colorado. /brAbout The Raima Database Manager Family /brRaima released the first version of the Raima embedded database in 1984. Since then the family has grown into two successful embedded database products. RDM Embedded pioneered the embedded market space under the name dbVista. Building on the success of RDM Embedded; Raima released the product in a client/server configuration under the name Velocis; now called RDM Server. Free download packages of the Raima embedded database SDKs are available at www.raima.com/downloads/./brAbout Raima Inc. /brRaima Inc. is a premier provider of high performance embedded database and dataflow solutions known as the Raima Database Manager (RDM) product line. Since 1984; the company has been focused on solving data management problems in a wide variety of embedded systems markets like Aerospace & Defense; Telecom; Financial; Consumer Electronics; Medical; Industrial Automation; and Business Automation. It is estimated that over time RDM products have been utilized by over 20;000 application developers resulting in over 20;000;000 runtime deployments. Raima continues to lead the way in innovation meeting the ever changing requirements embedded system worldwide.
what happened: Raima promoted Randy Merilatt to Chief Technology Officer
about person: Randy Merilatt is the founder of Raima.
about company: Raima Inc. is a premier provider of high performance embedded database and dataflow solutions known as the Raima Database Manager (RDM) product line.

title: Vice President of Technology
headline: RAMP Expands Executive Team with Search Technology Veteran Nathan Treloar
Industry: Software & Internet : Data Analytics; Management and Storage
The full text of the press release: September 22; 2010 08:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time /brRAMP Expands Executive Team with Search Technology Veteran Nathan Treloar /brVice President of Technology; Strategic Markets role created to expand RAMP’s presence in new market verticals and technologies /brWOBURN; Mass.  (BUSINESS WIRE)  RAMP; the industry’s leading Content Optimization platform for major online media publishers; announced today that it has appointed Nathan Treloar to the newly created position of Vice President of Technology; Strategic Markets. /brIn this position Nate will be responsible for expanding RAMP’s industry leading Content Optimization product and technology footprint into solutions specifically designed for new market verticals and platforms working with key customers and partners. /br“RAMP’s core value proposition has proven critical to the online publishing business goals of our current customer segments;” said Stephen Baker; Chief Revenue Officer of RAMP. “Nate’s proven leadership as a technology evangelist and visionary will be critical in applying these technologies and learning to new markets in a scalable way to further accelerate our growth trajectory and broaden our addressable market.” /brNate joins RAMP from Microsoft where he was the Principal Search Technology Evangelist in the Microsoft Enterprise Search Group and held responsibility for the group’s technology innovation and evangelism programs. He has more than 20 years of engineering and management experience working with search and decision support systems and has advised hundreds of world’s largest companies and government agencies on applications of search and search related technologies. /brNate came to Microsoft through the acquisition of FAST; where he was Senior Vice President of Technology and a member of the leadership team that took FAST from an entry level player to a leader in the enterprise search market. /brIn a career spanning more than two decades; Nate has held key executive positions for search; text mining; publishing; and knowledge management software and solutions. /br“The role of search and SEO continues to grow as more types of content move online and new forms of publishing gain mainstream adoption; such as social media;” said Nate Treloar. “RAMP is the only solution that has taken an exhaustive view of this emerging ecosystem and its associated challenges to address the critical business requirements of online publishers. Its success thus far is a good foundation to drive broader market adoption across new market verticals that will benefit from its solutions; and I am extremely pleased to have the opportunity to do so.” /brIn his new role; Nate will be based in RAMP’s Woburn; MA; headquarters reporting to Stephen Baker; Chief Revenue Officer. /brAbout RAMP /brRAMP is an advanced Content Optimization SaaS platform providing publishers’ workflow; discovery and engagement solutions to drive monetization of online content to users’ search and browsing behavior. RAMP offers publishers an open; flexible and modular capability to optimize large amounts of content; including text; audio; video and images; within dynamic publishing environments. As a result; publishers’ content becomes positioned for discovery and precise targeting; both on search engines and within publishers’ own websites. RAMP maximizes the value of publishers’ content while reducing costs. /brLeading publishers using RAMP include NBCU; ThomsonReuters; FOXNews; DowJones; Meredith; Comcast; and others. For more information visit: www.RAMP.com; or contact us at info@RAMP.com.
what happened: RAMP; the industry’s leading Content Optimization platform for major online media publishers; announced today that it has appointed Nathan Treloar to the newly created position of Vice President of Technology.
about person: Nathan Treloar was previously the Principal Search Technology Evangelist in the Microsoft Enterprise Search Group and held responsibility for the group’s technology innovation and evangelism programs.
about company: RAMP is an advanced Content Optimization SaaS platform providing publishers’ workflow; discovery and engagement solutions to drive monetization of online content to users’ search and browsing behavior.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Recruiter.com and RecruitingBlogs.com Agree to Merge; Creating a Leading Company for the HR and Recruiting Industry
Industry: Business Services : HR; Recruiting; & Payroll Services
The full text of the press release: Recruiter.com and RecruitingBlogs.com Agree to Merge; Creating a Leading Company for the HR and Recruiting Industry /brWill Offer Human Resources and Recruiting Industry a Standard Platform for Online Community and Services    Will Have Leading Position In HR and Recruiter Related Social Networking and Media Services    Will Position Company for Substantial Organic Growth and Opportunities in Technology /brBristol; CT (PRWEB) September 2; 2010 /brRecruiter.com and RecruitingBlogs.com Inc. announced today a definitive merger agreement to create a leader in the online recruiting and Human Resources space. The new USA based company; Recruiter.com; LLC will offer the industry's most complete platform to facilitate recruiter and HR social networking; knowledge sharing; and delivery of services./brThe new organization will leverage leading social media properties; domain name assets; and technology to enable communication across the highly fragmented recruitment and HR industry. Recruiter.com will continue development of RecruitingBlogs; the leading social network for the recruiting industry. Recruiter.com will also launch HR.net into a major publication and newsletter for HR executives; featuring the best and brightest minds in Human Resources./brJason Davis; as founder and CEO; engineered the development and acquisitions of RecruitingBlogs.com. At Recruiter.com; Davis will continue to architect the growth; partnerships; and innovation of the company as EVP of Strategic Development. Miles Jennings; COO of RecruitingBlogs.com; will manage business operations and planning as CEO. Ashley Saddul joins the company with a rich background in web technology and business strategy as a founding member and CTO. /br"The new organization will help build and nurture the recruiting and HR community;" said Davis. "Recruiter.com will bring a new level of visibility and service to our current community members as well as to reach a dramatically larger audience. Our new organization is well positioned to take a shot at developing technical solutions to solve various problems that recruiters face."/br"We will become the leading resource for reaching HR and Recruiting professionals by bringing together web community with services for the industry;" said Jennings. "We have assembled a very strong team with a clear mission. Our company is founded on transparency; communication; and dedication to the HR and recruiting industry that we serve."/brAshley Saddul said; "The HR and recruitment industry is a very exciting field for development; and we are optimistic about our immediate and long term opportunities. We will develop a cutting edge online resource for our members and build the most innovative destination for the industry."/brThe new company; Recruiter.com; LLC will be headquartered in Connecticut and retain offices in Toronto and Rhode Island./brInitial Services: /br• Growth of RecruitingBlogs; the social network for the recruiting industry/br• Delivery of HR.net to be a major publication for HR executives/br• Delivery of RecruitFest; a recruiting conference in partnership with Monster Worldwide/br• Organized and expanded partnership development/brJoin our community for recruiters at http://www.recruitingblogs.com/main/authorization/signUp/brAbout RecruitingBlogs.com/brRecruitingBlogs is a social network and community for recruiters and HR professionals established in 2007. The company focuses on delivering useful services and content to recruitment professionals such as recruiter and HR jobs; recruiting articles and videos; HR and Recruitment software resources; and professional networking. The directory features applicant tracking systems; recruiting software; social media services; job boards; and HRIS providers. RecruitingBlogs manages other social media and networks including a 100;000+ professional group for recruiters on Linkedin; and online forums and web communities./brRecruitingBlogs.com has partnered with Monster Worldwide to execute RecruitFest; a recruiting conference to be held October 7 8th; 2010. The event will engage front line practitioners and thought leaders in active discussion about current recruiting issues. Tickets for RecruitFest are available at http://www.eventbrite.com/event/657023174 /brAbout Recruiter.com/brAshley Saddul was President and CEO of Impressive Domains; a domain brokerage firm which he founded in 2005. He acquired a large portfolio of premium domains; including Recruiter.com. A seasoned entrepreneur and technologist; Saddul helped develop Simpli.com; an Internet startup company specializing in context sensitive search (acquired by NetZero for $23.5M). He also founded and developed Swords.com; a leading eCommerce and community portal. His corporate work includes management and strategic technology governance at Fleet Bank/Bank of America and American Power Conversion.
what happened: Ashley Saddul joined Recruiter.com as a founding member and CTO.
about person: Ashley Saddul was President and CEO of Impressive Domains; a domain brokerage firm which he founded in 2005. He acquired a large portfolio of premium domains; including Recruiter.com.
about company: RecruitingBlogs is a social network and community for recruiters and HR professionals established in 2007. The company focuses on delivering useful services and content to recruitment professionals such as recruiter and HR jobs; recruiting articles and videos; HR and Recruitment software resources; and professional networking.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: RDC Appoints Technology Leader ; Distinguished Technologist to Drive Innovation and Growth
The full text of the press release: September 20; 2010 11:54 AM Eastern Daylight Time /brRDC Appoints Technology Leader/br/brDistinguished Technologist to Drive Innovation and Growth/br/brWILMINGTON; Del.  (BUSINESS WIRE)  RDC; the global leader in risk intelligence; announced the executive appointment of Dr. James Lin as its Chief Technology Officer. Dr. Lin; a visionary technology executive with extensive experience in transforming unstructured web and media information into actionable business intelligence; will oversee innovation; development and core technology across all business units at the Company./br/br “home page for the world’s business leaders.”/br/brDr. Lin joins RDC from Forbes.com; where he served as Chief Information Officer and spearheaded technology innovations to power what is widely regarded as the “home page for the world’s business leaders.” His overall technological leadership was instrumental in transforming Forbes.com into the #1 business website reaching more than 18 million people each month. Prior to Forbes.com; Dr. Lin delivered technology solutions and information services for financial institutions worldwide; having held senior positions with Standard & Poor’s; Merrill Lynch; and Clearbrook Financial. Born in China; Dr. Lin was awarded his Ph.D. from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology./br/brTom Obermaier; RDC Chief Executive Officer said; “For the first time; the risk intelligence industry has a technological visionary at its helm. Dr. Lin’s track record speaks for itself and we can’t wait to turn loose his innovative genius and technological firepower at RDC as he leads the evolution of the industry. Dr. Lin’s leadership will assure that RDC continues to become the industry standard as next generation solutions are delivered. We are thrilled he decided to join RDC.”/br/brAbout RDC/br/brRegulatory DataCorp Inc.; also known as RDC; delivers powerful; decision ready open source intelligence and world class risk and compliance protection; allowing global organizations to identify banned/suspect entities; strengthen fraud protection; ensure regulatory compliance; manage supply and distribution risk; and protect their brand equity. With the world’s largest open source risk relevant database; RDC provides AML/KYC compliance; Politically Exposed Persons (PEP) protection; emerging market intelligence; corruption; fraud and crime protection; vendor screening and monitoring; and credit risk monitoring to a wide range of clients worldwide. Founded by 20 of the world’s leading financial institutions; today RDC is also a Bain Capital and Goldman Sachs portfolio company. For more information; visit www.rdc.com
what happened: RDC appointed James Lin as Chief Technology Officer
about person: James Lin was previously the CIO at Forbes.com
about company: Regulatory DataCorp Inc.; also known as RDC; delivers powerful; decision ready open source intelligence and world class risk and compliance protection; allowing global organizations to identify banned/suspect entities; strengthen fraud protection; ensure regulatory compliance; manage supply and distribution risk.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: RemedyMD Bolsters Executive Leadership Team in Response to Demand for Registries
Industry: Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech : Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech Other
The full text of the press release: September 09; 2010 11:53 AM Eastern Daylight Time /brRemedyMD Bolsters Executive Leadership Team in Response to Demand for Registries/br/brNew President and Chief Operating Officer Jim Hyde Offers a Wide Range of Experience in Rapidly Growing Companies/br/brSALT LAKE CITY  (BUSINESS WIRE)  RemedyMD announced today that Jim Hyde has joined its team as President and Chief Operating Officer. Jim will provide executive leadership to support RemedyMD’s recent growth; allowing former President and COO Adam Slovik to focus on delivering the next generation of integrated registries as Chief Technology Officer./br/br “Researchers and providers alike have recognized the need to build registries as a way to dramatically improve their effectiveness”/br/brRemedyMD recently announced contracts to build registries for the University of Texas Southwestern; Tethys; and the National Fibromyalgia Association and has plans to announce several others in the coming weeks./br/brJim has a wide range of experience in the corporate technology sector; which will support this growth; including operations management; software development; and research. Prior to joining RemedyMD; Jim served as COO at In Store Broadcasting Network and Overstock.com; and as a VP of Applications Development at Tenfold. Jim has a B.S. and a Ph.D. from Stanford in Mechanical Engineering and a Master’s Degree from MIT./br/br“Researchers and providers alike have recognized the need to build registries as a way to dramatically improve their effectiveness;” comments Gary Kennedy; founder and chief executive officer of RemedyMD. “At this point in our growth we need a process oriented executive who can build a business model that scales as rapidly as our business is growing. Jim’s unique background makes him a great fit for RemedyMD.”/br/brRemedyMD enables researchers and clinicians to collect; aggregate; harmonize; and analyze data from disparate data types and sources; enabling researchers to see a 360º view of each patient or research subject./br/br“I am happy that Jim has decided to join RemedyMD. I have known him for several years and he is eminently qualified;” said Adam Slovik; President and COO of RemedyMD. “In order to continue our rapid growth I will need to devote my complete attention to the development of resalable registries and tools.”/br/brAbout RemedyMD/br/brRemedyMD is the leading provider of registries for life sciences. RemedyMD’s highly specific patient and disease registry software and comparative effectiveness research tools enable researchers; clinicians and scientists to collect; aggregate; harmonize; and analyze data from widely disparate sources and then use RemedyMD tools and applications to identify patterns that result in accelerated discoveries; better patient outcomes; and advance translational research. For more information visit: www.RemedyMD.com./br/brContacts/br/brRemedyMD/brDon Holm; 801 733 3373/brdholm@remedymd.com
what happened: RemedyMD appointed Adam Slovik as Chief Technology Officer
about person: Adam Slovik was previously the President and COO at RemedyMD
about company: RemedyMD is the leading provider of registries for life sciences. RemedyMD’s highly specific patient and disease registry software and comparative effectiveness research tools enable researchers; clinicians and scientists to collect; aggregate; harmonize; and analyze data from widely disparate sources and then use RemedyMD tools and applications to identify patterns that result in accelerated discoveries; better patient outcomes; and advance translational research.

title: Vice President of Information Systems
headline: Rent to own News   Rent One promotes McGovern to VP of Information Systems
The full text of the press release: September 24; 2010/brMt. Vernon; Illinois based Rent One today; announced the promotion of long term employee Lori McGovern to the position of Vice President of Information Systems./brMcGovern began her career at Rent One in 1989 while still in high school; as a part time assistant at the corporate office; working directly with the company’s owners; Larry and Sharon Carrico./br/brShe eventually moved to full time and quickly learned and helped in a variety of tasks; including payroll; accounts payable; supply distribution; store audits; and in her spare time worked behind the counter at the Mount Vernon; IL store./br/br“I love knowing how everything works and; by working in the stores I could work better in the corporate office;” McGovern said. “I have always loved what I do and as my grandma always told us; 'If a job it worth doing; it’s worth doing well.'”/br/brIn 1993 the company changed software companies and she discovered a new direction; a new opportunity to learn and grow. With ongoing enthusiasm and education; she became the manager of information systems in 1998; focusing on the company’s inventory and computer systems. /brLori excelled in her new position and as the company grew; so did her experience and expertise./br/brBorn in Mt. Vernon; McGovern married her husband; Kevin; in 1992 and moved to Newfoundland; Canada where he was stationed with the US Navy for two years. She kept in touch with the Carrico’s during this time; and when the McGovern’s moved back to Illinois; Lori called Sharon to see if there was an opening./br/br“It worked out that the person who had taken over for me was leaving; the job was mine if I wanted it and I was thrilled;” she said./brKevin and Lori now have three children Ethan; Lacey; and Jamie and a granddaughter; Harlow./br/brUnder McGovern's management; the Rent One Information Systems Department has grown to a total of five people who are responsible for the systems and information technology of the now 50 store company. /br/br“It has been great watching Rent One grow; being able to personally grow with it; and see others grow too;" she said. "If it wasn’t for my crew this wouldn’t have been possible. They are great; dedicated; and hard working people.”
what happened: Mt. Vernon; Illinois based Rent One today; announced the promotion of long term employee Lori McGovern to the position of Vice President of Information Systems.
about person: McGovern began her career at Rent One in 1989 while still in high school; as a part time assistant at the corporate office; working directly with the company’s owners; Larry and Sharon Carrico./br/br/brShe eventually moved to full time and quickly learned and helped in a variety of tasks; including payroll; accounts payable; supply distribution; store audits; and in her spare time worked behind the counter at the Mount Vernon; IL store.
about company: Rent One is a retailer offering rent to own furniture; electronics and appliances.

title: Senior Information Technology Program Manager
headline: Robert Delany Joins Ross & Baruzzini as Senior Information Technology Program Manager
Industry: Real Estate & Construction : Architecture; Engineering & Design
The full text of the press release: Robert Delany Joins Ross & Baruzzini as Senior Information Technology Program Manager/brBY Ross & Baruzzini | Posted: Thursday; October 21; 2010 12:19 PM/brSaint Louis; MO – October 21; 2010 – Ross & Baruzzini; a globally recognized engineering and architectural planning; design and consulting firm; has announced the appointment of Robert Delany as Senior Information Technology Program Manager. He will be working with the Los Angeles World Airports IT Program Management Office based in Los Angeles; California./brMr. Delany joins the firm with over 25 years of experience in project management and information technology. His prior employment included a position at Fulton & Coard Inc. in Glenview; Illinois. He is committed to business transformation through process consistency; achievable pragmatic parameters and continuous service quality improvement. Mr. Delany has a thorough understanding of initiation; development; implementation and operating strategies for Project Management Office processes and governance. His distinctive capabilities are a great asset to the firm./br“Bob has deep experience in project management; contracts and controls for enterprise IT and technology programs with a unique ability to ensure that proposed technology ROI meets the objectives of the customer's business;” said Michael Robie; Vice President of Technology Solutions./brMr. Delany holds a Master of Business Administration degree from the University of Illinois – Chicago and a Bachelor of Science degree from Northeastern Illinois University. /brAbout Ross & Baruzzini; Inc./brRoss & Baruzzini (www.rossbar.com) specializes in providing consulting and engineering design for facilities and infrastructure in transportation; healthcare; higher education; government and facilities requiring 24/7 operations. The firm approaches each new project with a detailed understanding of business processes; facilities and technology requirements to ensure that personnel; equipment; communications and procedures are fully integrated for maximum efficiency and effectiveness. Founded in 1953; Ross & Baruzzini is continually ranked as one of the top engineering firms in the nation. The company has regional offices in Miami; Indianapolis; Chicago and New York and project offices in Los Angeles; California and Doha; State of Qatar. Corporate headquarters are stationed in St. Louis.

title: Chief Information Officer
headline: Ryder System appoints new senior vice president and chief information officer
The full text of the press release: Ryder System appoints new senior vice president and chief information officer/brSep 15; 2010 (Datamonitor via COMTEX)    /brRyder System; a provider of transportation and supply chain management solutions; has appointed Keyvan Bohlooli as its senior vice president and chief information officer. Mr Bohlooli will replace Kevin Bott; who will be retiring following a 15 year career with Ryder. /brIn this new role; Mr Bohlooli will be responsible for all aspects of Ryder's IT organization; including technology vision and strategy; operations and project management; infrastructure and software development; resource optimization and systems development lifecycle. /brMr Bohlooli joins Ryder after more than 20 years with NextEra Energy; where he most recently served as vice president of information management of NextEra Energy Resources; which included the wind power development division. /brGreg Greene; executive vice president and chief administrative officer of Ryder System; said: "We are pleased to welcome Keyvan to Ryder. He brings an extensive background of leading information technology teams to drive business results within the deregulated energy industry; where innovation; consistency and reliability are paramount."

title: Director of Technology
headline: Business People: Sacred Heart Academy names new hires
The full text of the press release: Business People: Sacred Heart Academy names new hires/brSacred Heart Academy in Hamden has appointed Monroe resident Kathryn Cioffi as director of technology. She has a bachelor's degree from Georgetown University and a master's degree from Fairfield University. She has a Connecticut state certification in administration and supervision. She worked for the Diocese of Bridgeport Cathedral cluster schools; and most recently was with the Weston school system. Monroe resident Kathryn Gorman has been hired to teach English at Sacred Heart. She double majored in English and journalism at the University of Rhode Island. Before joining Sacred Heart; she taught English at Fairfield Ludlowe High School. Sacred Heart also hired Victor Mazmanian of the Riverside section of Greenwich to teach honors physics and honors pre calculus. He comes to the academy from the U.S. Air Force Academy in Colorado Springs; Colo.; where he was assistant professor of physics. Before that; he was director of the mathematics and science program at the Graduate School of Education at Manhattanville College in Purchase; N.Y. He has a doctoral degree from Columbia Teachers College. After retirement from teaching advanced placement physics at the high school level; he was chairman of the mathematics and science department at the newly established American University of Kuwait; licensed by Dartmouth College./brRichard Lee/brBusiness People reports on new businesses; company relocations; awards; job changes and special appointments. Information can be submitted to business@scni.com. We reserve the right to edit or reject submissions.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Salamander Technologies Announces New Chief Technology Officer To Spearhead InterTRAX Initiative
The full text of the press release: Salamander Technologies Announces New Chief Technology Officer to Spearhead interTRAX Initiative/brSeptember 25th 2010 /brTraverse City; MI (PRWEB) March 25; 2007 /brSalamander Technologies Inc.; a leading provider of First Responder Accountability; Emergency Incident Command; and Mass Casualty Patient tracking systems nationwide; is pleased to announce the addition of Rob Jones as Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to spearhead the interTRAX initiative. Jones; a recognized leader in wireless; mobile and web development technologies; was previously employed with AT&T WIRELESS SERVICES; HOMEGROCER.COM; REAL NETWORKS and later at WYNDHAM as an integral leader in each of those organizations engineering excellence./brAt AT&T WIRELESS SERVICES he established his expertise in developing telephony grade applications for use in wireless communications systems. He pioneered various achievements to enhance key Internet service offerings including; but not limited; to on line communications processes for REAL NETWORKS. For HOMEGROCER.COM he developed e commerce services integrating Symbol Wireless Technologies handhelds into the mobile field delivery operations; wireless order fulfillment and inventory management process./brRuss Miller; President of Salamander Technologies; stated: “We are extremely pleased to have Rob as a member of our executive team. He brings to Salamander Technologies 18 years of knowledge and experience not only in the internet and handheld computing field but also as a proven leader in meeting real world customer requirements. We are certain he will demonstrate through his efforts that Salamander Technologies is a thought leader in the Emergency Management Technologies equation.”/br“I am very excited to be working with Salamander Technologies;” added Jones. “By joining Salamander Technologies; I can take my unique blend of business and engineering experiences and enhance the Salamander Technologies Intellectual Property from the Tag to the Web by continuing to architect and engineer world class solutions to help our nation’s emergency responders do their jobs better.”/brJones latest responsibilities as VP Enterprise Architecture for WYNDHAM established his credentials as a top leader in Software Engineering and Large Scale Service Oriented Architectures. With a BS in Electrical Engineering from Michigan State and a MBA from the University of Washington; Seattle; Jones adds additional breadth of knowledge to the executive leadership team at Salamander Technologies./brSalamander Technologies; Inc.; www.salamandertechnologies.com; maker of fireTRAX accountability; is the nation’s leading provider of personnel accountability solutions. Combining manual accountability with an electronic incident command solution; Salamander Technologies offers a simple; scalable; NIMS compliant solution for incident management. The founders of Salamander Technologies; Inc; President – Russ Miller and Vice President – Mike Whelan are also known for their landmark work: Resource Accountability Guide for First Responders.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: SALEM COMMUNITY COLLEGE NAMES CHIEF TECHNOLOGY OFFICER
The full text of the press release: SALEM COMMUNITY COLLEGE NAMES CHIEF TECHNOLOGY OFFICER /br15 October 2010/brUS Fed News/brCARNEYS POINT TOWNSHIP; N.J.; Oct. 14    Salem Community College issued the following news release:/brJohn J. Pardini Jr. has been appointed Chief Technology Officer at Salem Community College./brReporting to Provost Joan M. Baillie; Pardini manages the institutional technology staff and College resources to meet SCC's strategic IT priorities of supporting growing infrastructure needs; enhancing services for students and integrating continuous assessment to better serve the entire College community./br"John's extensive experience and leadership in business will be instrumental in advancing the College's technology based services;" said Provost Baillie./brPardini brings over 13 years of management experience in information technology; specializing in managing business projects with both long  and short term impact. In his most recent industry roles; Pardini was Manager of Network Services with South Jersey Industries and Information Technology Analyst with South Jersey Gas Co./brThe Clementon; N.J. resident holds a Master of Science degree in Information Systems Management from Holy Family University and a bachelor's degree from Thomas Edison State College. Pardini serves as an adjunct instructor at Holy Family University in its Information Systems Management graduate and Computer Information Systems undergraduate programs.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Sanomedics Names Gary O'Hara as CTO
Industry: Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech : Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech Other
The full text of the press release: August 31; 2010 08:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time /brGary O'Hara Named Chief Technology Officer at Sanomedics/br/brCo founded Intelligent Medical Systems/br/brInvented the first commercialized infrared tympanic thermometer (FirstTemp® and Genius® brands)/br/brCo founded Tryom Inc.; creating acclaimed backgammon; chess and contract bridge games/br/brMember of venture capital firm Tech Coast Angels; providing business acumen and financing to early stage technology and biomedical companies/br/brMIAMI  (BUSINESS WIRE)  Keith Houlihan; Co founder and President of Sanomedics International Holdings (Pink Sheets: SIMH); today announced that Gary O'Hara has been named Chief Technology Officer for Sanomedics International Holdings. Mr. O'Hara brings over 25 years of leading medical and technological product innovation and business development experience to the Sanomedics team./br/br “Gary provides us with a wealth of technological experience and knowledge that will surely lead to needed innovative medical devices that positively impact the lives of people on a daily basis.”/br/br“Gary is a successful entrepreneur and one of the brightest creative innovators in the field today as evidenced by the numerous medical devices he has created; as well as the technological patents he holds for personal information devices and gaming applications;“ said Keith Houlihan; Co founder and President. “Gary will be responsible for leading the Sanomedics development team and brings a wealth of experience which we believe will make us the leading home medical device company in the world."/br/brMr. O’Hara was the co founder of Intelligent Medical Systems (IMS) and built the company to more than 200 employees while making “Inc. 500’s” list of fastest growing U.S. private companies. He invented the first commercialized infrared tympanic thermometer (FirstTemp® and Genius® brands) for which he was cited as Inventor of the Year by the San Diego Patent Law Association. In 1993; the Company was acquired by Fortune 500 pharmaceutical manufacturer American Home Products. Prior to his work in the medical device industry; he co founded Tryom; Inc. which was a developer and manufacturer of handheld personal information devices and electronic games of strategy such as backgammon; chess and contract bridge. Mr. O'Hara has also been active in the seed and startup phases of many ventures through his involvement with the Tech Coast Angels which is an organization of 150 investors that invest in and mentor early stage technology and biomedical companies. Mr. O'Hara holds numerous patents related to medical devices and electronic computer games and holds B.S. and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from the University of Michigan as well as an MBA from Eastern Michigan University./br/br“Gary's coming to Sanomedics represents a milestone in our growth as an international company dedicated to providing easy to use and effective medical diagnostic devices that will have a positive impact on the way in which medical care is delivered anywhere in the world; whether in clinics; hospitals or the patient’s home;” said Craig Sizer; Co Founder and Chairman. "Gary provides us with a wealth of technological experience and knowledge that will surely lead to needed innovative medical devices that positively impact the lives of people on a daily basis."/br/brAbout Sanomedics/br/brSanomedics International Holdings; Inc. (SIMH) manufactures and distributes innovative professional medical; as well as; home health diagnostic devices and products. As a pioneer in the trend toward preventive medicine; Sanomedics’ goal is to act as a bridge between the high technology medical world and the home healthcare environment. All Sanomedics professional and home healthcare diagnostic products are extremely easy to use; while providing accurate results in less than one second./br/brForward Looking Statements/br/brThis press release may contain statements which constitute forward looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995; including statements regarding the intent belief or current expectations of the Company; its directors; or its officers with respect to the future operating performance of the Company Investors are cautioned that any such forward looking statements are not guarantees of future performance and involve risks and uncertainties; and that actual results may differ materially from those in the forward looking statements as a result of various factors. The Company's periodic filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission should be viewed for a complete understanding of risk and uncertainty.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Sendouts Names New President and CEO
The full text of the press release: Sendouts Names New President and CEO /brBrian Hopcraft named as President and CEO of Sendouts. Mr. Hopcraft will lead the recruiting software solutions company to new levels of growth and development. /brSt. Louis; MO (PRWEB) September 1; 2010 /brSendouts; the premier provider of staffing and recruiting software; is pleased to announce the appointment of Brian Hopcraft as President and Chief Executive Officer. In this role; Mr. Hopcraft will lead the organization toward its vision to become the leading software provider in the recruiting industry./brRecruiting firms are facing many challenges in today's environment; including pressure to reduce fees while experiencing increased workload from a more intense focus on business development. As a result; firms must improve productivity and Sendouts' staffing and recruiting software solution provides a cost effective tool to enhance the recruiter's efficiency and effectiveness./br"This is an exciting time in the Company's evolution and we are confident of Brian's abilities to help transition us to the next phase of Sendouts' growth and development. Brian is extremely customer focused and eager to further improve our products and services for our clients;" said Tom Hillman; Sendouts' Board Chairman. /brMr. Hopcraft brings 20 years of executive leadership; technology expertise and a proven track record of growing and leading successful companies. As a founder and CEO of Simplified Workforce Solutions; Mr. Hopcraft built an organization that delivered best in class workforce management solutions and experienced outstanding growth built upon serving the customer needs. Mr. Hopcraft also held the position of Vice President; Enterprise Products at Oracle where he was responsible for 360Commerce's enterprise product line that included Workforce Management and Returns Management. Most recently; Mr. Hopcraft was the Chief Operating Officer and Vice President of Marketing for Dennemeyer & Co.; a global IP software and services company where he was responsible for the US business division./br"I am very pleased to join the Sendouts team. I am impressed with what they have accomplished to date building the company and positioning it as a leader in the recruiting software space. However; I am most excited about our prospects to accelerate the growth of the company toward our goal of becoming the software of choice for customers in our markets. I look forward to meeting with our customers to ensure we understand and meet their needs to the best of our ability;" said Mr. Hopcraft./brHopcraft replaces Don Breckenridge Jr. who founded the company along with Rick Hall who continues as the Chief Technology Officer for the Company. Breckenridge is leaving the company to pursue other interests. "The Board is grateful for Don's leadership; passion; and dedication; during his time at Sendouts;" added Hillman./brAbout Sendouts /brSendouts™ is the leading; single source provider of recruiting software for third party staffing and recruiting firms. Sendouts web based recruiting software enables recruiting firms to streamline their recruiting process; increase productivity; and make more placements. Additionally Sendouts provides unparalleled training and support and is backed by an industry leading 98% customer satisfaction rate. Sendouts clients on average achieve an internal growth rate of 48% and increase job order fill rates by over 20%. Sendouts helps more than 1;000 firms automate and manage the entire recruiting process; from sales to final placement. For more information; visit http://www.sendouts.com or call 877 309 5222
what happened: Sendouts appointed Rick Hall as Chief Technology Officer
about person: Rick Hall was previously the founder of Sendouts.
about company: Sendouts™ is the leading; single source provider of recruiting software for third party staffing and recruiting firms.

title: President
headline: Siemens PLM Software; Siemens PLM Software Names Chuck Grindstaff as President
The full text of the press release: Press Release/brSiemens PLM Software Names Chuck Grindstaff as President/brHelmuth Ludwig to Head Global Communications Team for Siemens Industry Automation Division/br/brPLANO; Texas; August 26; 2010   Siemens PLM Software; a business unit of the Siemens Industry Automation Division and a leading global provider of product lifecycle management (PLM) software and services; today announced it has promoted Charles C. “Chuck” Grindstaff; currently executive vice president of Products and Chief Technology Officer; to president. Grindstaff’s appointment takes effect October 1 upon the beginning of Siemens’ new fiscal year./br/brGrindstaff has worked in increasingly senior positions with Siemens PLM Software over 32 years and is recognized throughout the PLM industry for his visionary and thought leadership. Click here to see full bio./br/brGrindstaff succeeds Dr. Helmuth Ludwig; who Siemens Industry Automation today announced would head its global Communications team. Ludwig; who has served in increasingly senior positions with Siemens since 1990 and who joined Siemens PLM Software as president in 2007 soon after its acquisition by Siemens; will focus on working with each of the division’s four business units to provide a range of strategic communications services. His appointment is also effective October 1. Click here to see full bio./br/br“Today’s announcement marks a strong endorsement of the success of integrating Siemens PLM Software into Siemens as well as Siemens PLM Software’s ability to out perform the competition;” said Anton S. Huber; CEO of the Siemens Industry Automation Division. “Through Tony Affuso’s; our chairman and CEO; and Chuck’s leadership; Siemens PLM Software will continue to capitalize on its superior technology and thus help Siemens continue to push forward in the industry software space. At the same time; Helmuth’s deep knowledge of the company and its industries will support strong growth for the division’s global business units. This is a win win for Siemens and its commitment to customer success.”/brAbout Siemens PLM Software/br/brSiemens PLM Software; a business unit of the Siemens Industry Automation Division; is a leading global provider of product lifecycle management (PLM) software and services with 6.7 million licensed seats and 63;000 customers worldwide. Headquartered in Plano; Texas; Siemens PLM Software works collaboratively with companies to deliver open solutions that help them turn more ideas into successful products. For more information on Siemens PLM Software products and services; visit www.siemens.com/plm./brAbout the Siemens Industry Automation Division/br/brThe Siemens Industry Automation Division (Nuremberg; Germany) is a worldwide leader in the fields of automation systems; industrial controls and industrial software. Its portfolio ranges from standard products for the manufacturing and process industries to solutions for whole industrial sectors that encompass the automation of entire automobile production facilities and chemical plants. As a leading software supplier; Industry Automation optimizes the entire value added chain of manufacturers – from product design and development to production; sales and a wide range of maintenance services. With around 39;000 employees worldwide (September 30); Siemens Industry Automation achieved sales of €7.0 billion in fiscal year 2009. www.siemens.com/industryautomation/br/brNote: Siemens and the Siemens logo are registered trademarks of Siemens AG. All other trademarks; registered trademarks or service marks belong to their respective holders./brPrimary Contact/br/brSalim Rahimi/br+1 972 987 3206/brsalim.rahimi@siemens.com
what happened: Siemens PLM Software promoted Charles Grindstaff to President
about person: Charles Grindstaff was previously the executive vice president of Products and Chief Technology Officer at Siemens PLS Software.
about company: Siemens PLM Software; a business unit of the Siemens Industry Automation Division; is a leading global provider of product lifecycle management (PLM) software and services with nearly 6.7 million licensed seats and 63;000 customers worldwide

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: EZYield.com Taps Veteran IT Developer; Michael Miller; as Chief Technology Officer
The full text of the press release: /br26 October 2010/br/brEZYield.com Taps Veteran IT Developer; Michael Miller; as Chief Technology Officer/br/brWell known IT Professional to Lead Future Technology Development Initiatives for Fast Growing Hospitality Distribution Provider/br/br/brEZYield.com; the originator of automated online distribution management solutions for the worldwide hospitality industry; announces the appointment of well known information technology expert; Michael Miller; as Chief Technology Officer. Miller’s appointment comes on the heels of several years of rapid growth for the company; which has positioned EZYield.com as the world’s leading provider of integrated online distribution technologies. In his new role; Miller will be responsible for the development and global implementation of all new technological initiatives; as the company continues to expand its product offering./br/brAs a former senior engineer for the Walt Disney World Company in the 1990’s; Miller is perhaps best known as one of the inventors of Disney FastPass; a revolutionary queuing technology that has since become a staple at Disney theme parks around the world. He was also on the founding team of Leap Frog International; a popular line of interactive; technology based educational products and applications. As an entrepreneur; he developed firmware that is currently used in U.S. military radar systems. Prior to joining EZYield.com; Miller served as director of corporate IT for Compass Knowledge Group; an Orlando based firm that provides sales and marketing services to nonprofit universities. Previously; he held the same position at SunGard Higher Education; where he oversaw the deployment of numerous projects; spanning proprietary and commercial open source products./br/br"We're very fortunate to have a great technical mind like Mike Miller join the growing EZYield global team;" says Ed St. Onge; CEO of EZYield.com. "He has an impressive resume; both as a developer of innovative technologies and as an entrepreneur who truly understands how to meet the needs and expectations of clients in the highly competitive technology industry. We have several groundbreaking initiatives planned for EZYield over the coming year that will enhance our industry leading channel management solution and further expand our product offering to meet the growing needs of the global market. Mike’s experience and expertise will play an important role in that expansion."/br/brIn the short term; Miller will focus on maximizing the scalability and efficiency of all EZYield.com systems; both internal and external. Through implementation of advanced enterprise level infrastructure; Miller will ensure that EZYield.com continues to expand its technological capabilities and services; while maintaining the user friendly experience that has made EZYield.com the hospitality industry’s most popular channel management and distribution solution./br/brBased at EZYield.com’s headquarters in Winter Springs; Florida; Miller will be among the EZYield.com executives on hand to meet with current and prospective clients at World Travel Market in London; November 8 to 11; at Booth TT139. For more information; please contact EZYield.com sales at +1 407.629.0900; email sales@ezyield.com or visit www.ezyield.com./br/brAbout EZYield.com | Since introducing the world’s first automated channel management solution in 2002; EZYield.com has remained the undisputed leader in online distribution technology for the global hospitality industry. Today; 3;500 hotels in 92 countries utilize EZYield.com’s award winning; advanced channel management software to streamline the distribution of rates and inventory to 500 forward distribution channels in multiple languages and 168 currencies. EZYield.com's web based platform and mobile friendly solutions are designed to give control of online distribution back to the hotelier; with products dynamic and flexible enough to satisfy properties ranging from 4 to 4;000 rooms. EZYield.com maintains regional offices in Asia Pacific; Europe; Middle East and the America's; in order to provide continuous live support to their clients around the world. For more information; please visit www.ezyield.com./brMARKETPLACE/brCLICK HERE to learn more about EZ Yield.com; Inc./br/brTAGS/brdisney theme parks; disney fastpass; information technology expert; sungard higher education; walt disney world company; open source products; chief technology officer; compass knowledge; groundbreaking initiatives; leap frog; st onge; walt disney world; worldwide ho/br/brCONTACT/brDebi Moses/brSales Manager/brPhone: 407 629 0900 x16/brEmail: sales@ezyield.com/br/brORGANIZATION/brEZ Yield.com; Inc./brwww.ezyield.com/br125 Excelsior Parkway/brUSA   Winter Springs; FL 32708 2569/brPhone: +1 407 629 0900/brFax: +1 407 660 1880/brEmail: sales@ezyield.com/br/brRECENT NEWS/brEZYield.com Signs Connectivity Agreement With HotelTravel.com/brThursday 14 October 2010/brEZYield.com Helps Canada’s Delta Hotels and Resorts Maximize Yield Performance/brThursday 7 October 2010/brDistribution Solutions from EZYield.com Help Fuel Expansion For California Boutique Hotel Group/brTuesday 28 September 2010/brAll Articles from EZ Yield.com; Inc./br/br/br/br/br/br/br/br/br/br /br/brCopyright© 1995 2010 Hospitality Net™ All rights reserved./brTrademarks and product names are the property of their respective owners./brPrivacy Statement   Terms & Conditions   Advertising Information/br

title: Director of Technology
headline: Astro Pak Launches New Biological Decontamination Service Company; SixLog Corporation
The full text of the press release: Astro Pak Launches New Biological Decontamination Service Company; SixLog Corporation/brSep.06; 2010/brSixLog provides rapid and effective on site biological decontamination services utilizing revolutionary iHPTM (ionized Hydrogen Peroxide) technology/brAstro Pak Corporation; the U.S.’s largest precision cleaning and passivation company; today announced the launch of their new subsidiary; SixLog Corporation. nhl hockey jerseys SixLog provides on site bio decontamination services utilizing proprietary iHP? (ionized Hydrogen Peroxide) technology to a variety of industries including Life Sciences; Pharmaceutical; Healthcare; First Responders; Transportation; and Public Facilities. SixLog performs decontamination services for equipment; rooms; entire buildings; and modes of transportation such as ambulances; trains; and cruise ships./br“SixLog’s iHP? nfl jerseys bio decontamination technology was developed and perfected for military applications (biological weapons); said Ken Verheyen; President of Astro Pak. nfl football jerseys We’re excited to bring this revolutionary technology into the commercial marketplace.” iHP? can be used in open air and; once ionized; acts like a gas as opposed to a vapor; providing excellent nhl hockey jerseys distribution properties; and destroying microorganisms even in those hard to reach areas. Thus; iHP? is more effective; has excellent materials compatibility and requires a drastically shorter decontamination process time than alternatives./brSteve Feinstein will serve as SixLog’s Director of Technology. Most recently; Mr. Feinstein served as Regional Sales Manager for a British manufacturer of hydrogen peroxide vapor generators. Prior to that; he owned Medical Repair Laboratories; Inc. before selling the firm to a competitor where he served as/brSix Log nfl football jerseys website features a resource center containing technical papers; presentations; and other downloads for knowledge enrichment on biological decontamination and room sterilization. The website also offers industry news and events as well as widgets for seamless integration with social media.
what happened: SixLog appointed Steve Feinstein as Director of Technology
about person: Steve Feinstein was previously the Regional Sales Manager for a British manufacturer of hydrogen peroxide vapor generators. .
about company: SixLog provides rapid and effective on site biological decontamination and sterilization services utilizing proprietary iHPTM (ionized Hydrogen Peroxide).

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Skybox Security Appoints Dr. Amnon Lotem as Chief Technology Officer
Industry: Software & Internet : Data Analytics; Management and Storage
The full text of the press release: Skybox Security Appoints Dr. Amnon Lotem as Chief Technology Officer/br /br/brSAN JOSE; Calif.; Sept. 8 /PRNewswire/    Skybox Security; the leader in automated security risk and compliance management; today announced the appointment of Dr. Amnon Lotem as Chief Technology Officer. Dr. Lotem has more than 20 years of experience in Artificial Intelligence (AI); modeling and simulation techniques./br/brHe first joined Skybox Security in 2002 and; as Chief Scientist; guided the company's research in cyber security solutions and is responsible for development of the Company's patents; both awarded and pending. In addition; his experience with AI planning algorithms contributed materially to the development of the company's core algorithms for attack simulation; risk analysis; and network compliance./br/br"I am honored to have been named Chief Technology Officer at this important time in the history of the company;" said Lotem. "With the growing worldwide need for critical infrastructure protection and cyber defense; it will be exciting to extend Skybox solutions to provide further proactive protection against evolving threats."/br/brPrior to joining Skybox Security; Dr. Lotem was co founder of Estimotion Ltd. He also held R&D management positions at Amdocs and Technomatix Technologies. Dr. Lotem holds an M. Sc. in Computer Science from Tel Aviv University and a Ph. D. in Computer Science from the University of Maryland./br/br"We are very pleased to appoint Dr. Lotem as CTO;" stated Gidi Cohen; CEO of Skybox Security. "His success in developing core algorithms; coupled with his deep understanding of cyber security and threats; makes him the ideal choice to drive our technical strategy."/br/brThe Skybox Security portfolio includes:/br/br * Skybox Firewall Assurance (Firewall Assurance; PCI Compliance; Change Assurance; Firewall Ruleset Optimization)/br * Skybox Network Assurance (Network modeling; connectivity troubleshooting)/br * Skybox Risk Control (Attack modeling; risk assessment; vulnerability management; patch optimization)/br * Skybox CertiFire (Mid market solution for firewall assurance; PCI audit)/br * Skybox 4000 Appliance (1U rack mount server appliance; pre installed Skybox View platform)/br/br/brAbout Skybox Security; Inc./br/brSkybox Security; Inc. is the leader in automated security risk and compliance management solutions; helping IT organizations pinpoint and prioritize security risks; compliance; and availability exposures within minutes. Our solutions automatically collect and analyze comprehensive data about network topology and systems; configuration settings; threats and vulnerabilities – anticipating the most urgent IT concerns before harm has been done. Medium to large organizations in Financial Services; Telecommunications; Retail; Government; Utilities; and Defense rely on Skybox Security solutions to reduce risk exposure and achieve compliance. For more information visit www.skyboxsecurity.com./br/brNOTE: Skybox® Security is a registered trademark of Skybox Security Inc. All other registered and unregistered trademarks herein are the sole property of their respective owners. Product specifications subject to change at any time without prior notice. © 2010 Skybox Security; Inc. All rights reserved./br/brSOURCE Skybox Security; Inc./brBack to top/br/brRELATED LINKS/brhttp://www.skyboxsecurity.com
what happened: Amnon Lotem is appointed as Chief Technology Officer at Skybox Security.
about person: Prior to joining Skybox Security; Dr. Lotem was co founder of Estimotion Ltd. He also held R&D management positions at Amdocs and Technomatix Technologies.
about company: Skybox Security; Inc. is the leader in automated security risk and compliance management solutions; helping IT organizations pinpoint and prioritize security risks; compliance; and availability exposures within minutes.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Andy Fraley joins Snap Retail as Chief Technology Officer
Industry: Software & Internet : E commerce and Internet Businesses
The full text of the press release: Thursday; September 2; 2010/brSnapRetail hires new CTO/brPittsburgh based social media and emarkerting firm SnapRetail named Andy Fraley chief technology officer; the company said Thursday./brFraley was most recently co founder and CTO for telecommunications firm CoManage; which was acquired by the Canadian company Syndesis Ltd. Prior to that; he led the software development for Fore Systems; where he worked from 1993 to 1997 leading the team from 15 people to nearly 200./br“Andy Fraley brings extensive experience in technology development to SnapRetail; and we are thrilled to have him join our team;” said CEO Ted Teele. “His ability to help grow dynamic companies and seize market opportunities will be extremely beneficial as we focus on creating easy to use marketing and social media solutions for independent retailers.”/brSnapRetail allows independent retailers to buy and sell wholesale products from vendors. The company spun out of OneCoast; a wholesale and marketing agency for wholesale gift vendors. SnapRetail launched two products in January; MarketPlace and TrafficBuilder; that help retailers research wholesale products and direct customer traffic to retailers’ websites.
what happened: Snap Retail announced that Andy Fraley has joined the company as Chief Technology Officer.

title: Director of Information Technology
headline: Longtime resident takes over as Solon's information technology director
The full text of the press release: Longtime resident takes over as Solon's information technology director/brPublished: Friday; October 08; 2010; 9:34 AM /brSOLON    City Council hired longtime resident Patricia Dawson as the new Director of Information Technology. /brDawson replaces Jeff Pokorny; who moved earlier this year to assistant to the city’s new Construction Project Administrator Dan Driscoll; part of a departmental restructuring move by Mayor Susan Drucker in the wake of a special audit by the state. /brDawson’s starting annual salary will be $87;000 and she is scheduled to start Monday; with two employees directly under her in the city’s Information Technologies Department; but then another nine employees in other city departments who will also be working closely with her; said Human Resources Director Tom Cornhoff. /br“I look forward to doing what I can to serve the community; to help maintain a city in good shape;” Dawson said Monday; after her hiring became official. /brDawson comes from John Carroll University; where she has worked for about 16 years; and prior to that; another 16 years with British Petroleum. /br“That’s probably all we’re going to get her for is 15 years or so; I’m guessing;” Cornhoff said. /brDawson said she moved to the city on Oct. 31; 1980; which will make her “a 30 year resident on Halloween.” /brPokorny moved over to assist Driscoll as the state wrapped up its special audit earlier this year; which determined that more than $2 million had fraudulently been awarded to two cement contractors in the previous administration; with former city Construction Supervisor Domonic Bisesi; 46; being indicted last month. /brAlso indicted were contractors Mario Leone; 73; of Parma; and his two sons; Massimo; 39; and Marco Leone; 47; both of Independence; each on charges of engaging in a pattern of corrupt activity; theft; tampering with records; bribery; receiving stolen property and money laundering. /brIn other business related to the city’s Table of Organization on Monday; Council approved an extra week of vacation for Police Chief Wayne Godzich; after Drucker declined to accept a pay raise this year. /br“According to our city charter; the mayor must remain the highest paid city official; and since a pay raise for Chief Godzich would have put him higher than me on the pay scale;” Drucker’s move basically prevented him from getting a pay raise as well. /brDrucker and Godzich are still going neck and neck in terms of salary; with Drucker still making 21 cents more; at $111;813.73 per year; while Godzich starts at a base pay of $104;000; but with 10 percent longevity calculated in; receives $111;813.52; Cornhoff said. /brAs a result; the city negotiated to give Godzich an extra week’s vacation; which he may or may not use before his pending retirement; meaning he could receive a payout when he steps down. /brDrucker said the extra week’s vacation was authorized by council for Godzich only and not his successors.
what happened: City Council of Solon appointed Patricia Dawson as Director of Information Technology
about person: Patricia Dawson was previously the Dir; Learning Support Services at the John Carroll University.
about company: Solon is a city located in Johnson County; Iowa; United States. Part of the Iowa City; Iowa Metropolitan Statistical Area; it is located a few miles from Lake MacBride State Park and the larger cities of Coralville and Iowa City. The population was 1;177 at the 2000 census.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: Len DeBenedictis Retires as Chief Technology Officer of Solta medical; Inc.
Industry: Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech : Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech Other
The full text of the press release: Len DeBenedictis Retires as Chief Technology Officer of Solta Medical; Inc./br /br/brHAYWARD; Calif.; Sept. 15 /PRNewswire FirstCall/    Solta Medical; Inc. (Nasdaq: SLTM); a global leader in the medical aesthetics market; today announced that Leonard C. DeBenedictis; 69; Chief Technology Officer and a member of the company's board of directors; will retire from Solta Medical on October 1; 2010. Mr. DeBenedictis will be available to advise the company through the end of the year and he plans to remain active in the development of other emerging medical technologies./br/brStephen J. Fanning; Chairman of the Board; President and CEO of Solta Medical; Inc. said; "Len has dedicated more than 45 years to the evolution of the laser industry and for the past decade was the driving force behind the breakthrough proprietary technology in our Fraxel® family of lasers. He joined us in 2008 with our acquisition of Reliant Technologies where Len was co founder and CTO. In his tenure at Solta Medical; Len's leadership resulted in Solta's flagship product for fractional skin resurfacing; the Fraxel re:store® DUAL. In addition; Len has been a key player in forging our personal care product initiative with Philips Consumer Lifestyle and leaves us with an impressive pipeline of innovative products. I want to thank him for all of his contributions to the company."/br/brAbout Solta Medical; Inc./br/brSolta Medical; Inc. is a global leader in the medical aesthetics market providing innovative; safe; and effective solutions for patients that enhance and expand the practice of medical aesthetics for physicians. The company offers products to address a range of skin issues under the industry's three premier brands: Thermage®; Fraxel® and Isolaz®. Thermage is an innovative; non invasive radiofrequency procedure for tightening and contouring skin. As the leader in fractional laser technology; Fraxel delivers minimally invasive clinical solutions to resurface aging and sun damaged skin. Isolaz is the only laser or light based system indicated for the treatment of inflammatory acne; comedonal acne; pustular acne; and mild to moderate inflammatory acne. Since 2002; approximately one million Thermage; Fraxel and Isolaz procedures have been performed in over 100 countries. For more information about Solta Medical; call 1 877 782 2286 or log on to www.Solta.com./br/brSOURCE Solta Medical; Inc./brBack to top/br/brRELATED LINKS/brhttp://www.solta.com/
what happened: Leonard DeBenedictis retired as Chief Technology Officer of Solta Medical; Inc.
about person: Leonard DeBenedictis was previously the co founder and CTO Reliant Technologies.
about company: Solta Medical; Inc. is a global leader in the medical aesthetics market providing innovative; safe; and effective solutions for patients that enhance and expand the practice of medical aesthetics for physicians.

title: Chief Technology Officer
headline: SquareTwo Financial Names Chris Reigrut Chief Technology Officer
The full text of the press release: SquareTwo Financial Names Chris Reigrut Chief Technology Officer/brDENVER; Oct. 5 /PRNewswire/    SquareTwo Financial; a leader in the $40 billion asset recovery and management industry; today announces Chris Reigrut as its vice president and chief technology officer. In this role; Reigrut will oversee the development and delivery of IT products and services within the company. /br"Chris has driven large scale technology initiatives and is a valuable addition to our IT team;" said Bill Weeks; chief information officer at SquareTwo Financial. "Chris comes to us with the depth; expertise; and experience needed to guide our IT operations to the next level. He is a perfect fit for the company's growth objectives."/brPrior to joining SquareTwo Financial; Reigrut was a consultant with Teravation; designing and building software to help countries control the spread of malaria and dengue fever in Africa. Before Teravation; Reigrut was chief application architect at Key Equipment Finance; where he led his team in implementing the company's first global originations platform built around consistent; common business processes. Prior to Key; Reigrut was the vice president and chief technology officer for Enterworks Philippines; and also held consulting positions with Anderson Consulting and Deloitte./br"I look forward to being a part of a company that truly understands the importance and value of technology;" said Reigrut. "SquareTwo Financial's significant investment in technology; paired with its focused; strategic approach to the development and implementation of that technology; is what keeps the company a leader in its industry. I look forward to working at such a fast paced; forward thinking organization."/brReigrut has a bachelor of science degree in both computer science and electrical engineering from Washington University in St. Louis; Missouri./brAbout SquareTwo Financial:/brSquareTwo Financial is a leader in the $40 billion asset recovery and management industry. Through its award winning technology and unique Partners Network; SquareTwo Financial creates a more effective way for companies and consumers to resolve their debt commitments. Fortune 500 companies in the health care; automotive; banking and credit card industries trust SquareTwo Financial to manage their debt portfolios. The company's national network of legal partners is dedicated to treating consumers fairly and ethically. SquareTwo Financial is based in Denver; Colo. Visit www.squaretwofinancial.com for more information./brSquareTwo Financial Website: www.squaretwofinancial.com /brCONTACTS: /br /brRick Roth /brChief Marketing Officer /brSquareTwo Financial /br303.713.2231 /brrroth@squaretwofinancial.com /br
what happened: SquareTwo Financial appointed Chris Reigrut as Chief Technology Officer
about person: Prior to joining SquareTwo Financial; Chris Reigrut was a consultant with Teravation; designing and building software to help countries control the spread of malaria and dengue fever in Africa.
about company: SquareTwo Financial is a leader in the $40 billion asset recovery and management industry.
